availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Johnston (Hardin Co, Ky, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Hardin County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Kentucky native. Married to Emily Johnston. Farmer in Hardin County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed John Ross as a farm laborer in 1860. Owned two enslaved person in Hardin County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 3, p. 81.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, District 3, p. 105B.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
